description:
Engineered to provide grip in all conditions when you're moving through rolling terrain. Both the shape and the adjustable bindings optimize your stride efficiency and ergonomics without sacrificing traction.

  • FIT-STEP™ Frame maintains a natural gait reducing impacts on joints
  • SoftTec™ decking is lightweight and offers great flotation in deep snow
  • 180™ EZ Binding is padded to eliminate pressure points
  • Control Wings™ keep your heels aligned for an efficient stride
  • Toe crampons provide great grip on firm snow
  • Articulation system maintains a natural foot position and allows for lateral flex
name: Tubbs Frontier Snowshoes - Unisex
